mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.parts_code, p.parts_name, p.parts_brand, p.parts_pn, p.parts_type, p.parts_parameters, m.mfrs_name, p.parts_status, p.create_user, p.create_time, p.update_user, p.update_time, r.bind_time, r.unbind_time FROM biz_ref_vehicle_parts r LEFT JOIN biz_parts p ON p.id = r.parts_id LEFT JOIN biz_manufacturer m ON m.id = p.mfrs_id WHERE r.vehicle_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND r.unbind_time is NULL
